remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of Axiom 4 of [Mendelson] p. 69.  This provides an axiom for a predicate calculus for a restricted domain. This theorem generalizes the unrestricted ~ stdpc4 and ~ spsbc .  See also ~ rspsbca and ~ rspcsbela .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
